room_title: Escape room "Film Noir" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: Film Noir was a blast! Challenging and rewarding. Highly recommend. If you are in the area I would say you should stop by!

room_title: Escape room "Film Noir" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: Our family of five (kids aged 18, 16 and 14) is visiting Portland and just completed the Film Noir game room. It was out first escape room experience. Glad we asked for a couple of clues in order to get out with three minutes to spare. The puzzles were challenging and our hosts were very supportive and fun. I'd love to do more of these! Thanks, Sara, et al!

room_title: Escape room "Film Noir" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: Had a great time with two friends - the Noir room was challenging without being frustrating and GM Christian was a delight!
